media:group.media:title: Hot Water Colors
media:group.media:description:
In both steam and on the surface of hot water, patterns and colors are revealed in optimal light conditions. But there's more...

Music: https://posy.bandcamp.com/
Or Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3zkrmBzisZKngkrd6gXLHg
Or Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/posy/1522538629

Track 1: https://posy.bandcamp.com/track/hot-water-2022 (Not yet on Streaming services)
Track 2: https://posy.bandcamp.com/track/fractals-of-nature
Track 3: Not released yet...

More about these surface droplets: https://www.nature.com/articles/srep08046
Atmospheric Optics (where I first discovered it many years ago): https://atoptics.co.uk/
